biotools.summary:
Simple downloading of reads and metadata from multiple next-generation sequencing data repositories.

Utility for simplifying bulk downloading data from next-generation sequencing repositories, like NCBI SRA, MG-RAST, and iMicrobe.

bioschemas.name: grabseqs

Simple downloading of reads and metadata from multiple next-generation sequencing data repositories.

Utility for simplifying bulk downloading data from next-generation sequencing repositories, like NCBI SRA, MG-RAST, and iMicrobe.
